title: How doctors are responding to Trump's autism and Tylenol announcement
description: Physicians worry pregnant women may forgo a treatment over an unproven link between Tylenol and autism.
content: After President Donald Trump told a room full of reporters that taking Tylenol during pregnancy was linked to a "very increased risk" of autism in children, several patients had questions for Dallas Reed, the chief of genetics and an OBGYN at Tufts M... [7003 chars]

title: McGinley hopes leaving nothing to chance can land a Ryder Cup away win
description: The former captain says ‘exponential’ investment has made this the best prepared European team in competition’s history
content: It started with some stern words. The US team trounced Europe 19-9 at Whistling Straits four years ago. Paul McGinley found himself under scrutiny as part of a European Ryder Cup committee that also includes Damon Buffini, Richard Scudamore and Ian R... [4045 chars]

title: Schoolboy yob, 16, who hurled HUGE 15kg seat over edge of 50ft drop inside busy mall is jailed
description: A 16-year-old boy has been jailed for eight months after throwing a 15kg sofa from a balcony at a busy shopping centre, narrowly missing shoppers.The
content:
